tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SculptureRestorationRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    restoration_date DATE,
    restoration_type VARCHAR(50),
    conservator_name VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SculptureRestorationRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    restoration_date DATE,
    conservator_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    conservation_date DATE,
    conservator_name VARCHAR(50),
    condition_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SculptureRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sculpture_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  restoration_date DATE,
  conservation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationHistory (
  conservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  restoration_type VARCHAR(50),
  conservator_name VARCHAR(255),
  conservation_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_record_id FOREIGN KEY(record_id) REFERENCES SculptureRecords(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conservation_id INT,
  restoration_step VARCHAR(100),
  log_entry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_conservation_id FOREIGN KEY(conservation_id) REFERENCES ConservationHistory(conservation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sculpture_tbl (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_used VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT
)

CREATE TABLE Restoration_Record_tbl (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    restoration_date DATE,
    restoration_description TEXT,
    restored_by VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Conservation_Record_tbl (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    conservation_date DATE,
    conservation_notes TEXT,
    conservator_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Inspection_Record_tbl (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_notes TEXT,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Sculptures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    artist_name TEXT,
    creation_year INT,
    current_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RestorationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    restoration_date DATE,
    restoration_type TEXT,
    restoration_description TEXT
);
